鳲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shī］
［《廣韻》式脂切，平脂，書。］
“鸤1”的繁体字。

鳲字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鳲； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1482第10
【廣韻】式之切【集韻】【韻會】廾脂切【正韻】申之切，?音尸。【爾雅·釋鳥】鳲鳩，鴶鵴。【註】布穀也。江東呼穫穀。【疏】一名擊穀。一名桑鳩。方言云戴勝，非也。【詩·曹風】鳲鳩在桑，其子七兮。又或作尸。【前漢·鮑宣傳】視之當如一，合《尸鳩》之詩。【註】言君子布德施惠，亦當然也。又別作䲩。【揚子·方言】鳩，梁宋閒謂之鷦。䲩又作?。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鸤; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1482 No. 10
[Guang Yun] Style Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Qi Zhi Cut [Zheng Yun] Shen Zhi Cut, sound corpse. 【Erya·Shiniao】鸤鸤,鴶鴴. [Note] Cuckoo also. Jiangdong Huhuo Valley. 【Sparse】One hits the valley. A Sanjiu. Dialect Yun Dai Sheng, it is not. 【Poetry·Cao Feng】The pigeon is in the mulberry, and his son is seven. Or as a corpse. [Previous Han·Bao Propaganda] It should be regarded as one, and it is the same as the poem of "Scorpion Dove". [Note] It is of course also to say that the gentleman is good. Don't be foolish. [Yangtze Dialect] Dove, Liang Songxian called the wren. He did it again.
